name: quote-maker-api
description: A Web API for generating images of quotes

scripts.vercel-build: yum --showduplicates list zlib && yum install libuuid-devel libmount-devel zlib google-noto-emoji-color-fonts.noarch && cp /lib64/{libuuid,libmount,libblkid,libz}.so.1 node_modules/canvas/build/Release/

author: cyberpirate92
